ISSUE.TITLE: Include optional swagger-ui
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Connexion 2.0 made swagger-ui optional, I think we need to depend on it explicitly. I'm seeing this error with a fresh install via TestPyPI (#195): ``` The swagger_ui directory could not be found. Please install connexion with extra install: pip install connexion[swagger-ui] or provide the path to your local installation by passing swagger_path=<your path> ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Depend on connexion[swagger-ui] which is separate since connexion 2.0. Fixes #213
